ROOT.GetList: SELECT x.id,x.name,x.pg1,x.pg2,x.connectionline_type,x.lineid,x.linename,x.volname FROM ( SELECT b.id,b.name,b.pg1,b.pg2,b.connectionline_type,s.id as lineid,s.name as linename,v.name as volname FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONNECTIONLINE_B b JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONNECTIONLINE_R r ON b.id=r.connectionline_id and r.menber_type=0 and (r.off_time is null or r.off_time>sysdate) join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_HVDCSYS_B s on r.member_id=s.id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v ON s.voltage_type=v.code WHERE b.pg1={0} or b.pg2={0} or b.pg1 in (select id from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B WHERE parent_id={0}) or b.pg2 in (select id from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B WHERE parent_id={0}) UNION ALL SELECT b.id,b.name,b.pg1,b.pg2,b.connectionline_type as type,r.member_id as lineid,r.line_name as linename,v.name as vol FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONNECTIONLINE_B b JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONNECTIONLINE_R r ON b.id=r.connectionline_id and r.menber_type=1 and (r.off_time is null or r.off_time>sysdate) left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v ON r.voltage_type=v.code WHERE b.pg1={0} or b.pg2={0} or b.pg1 in (select id from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B WHERE parent_id={0}) or b.pg2 in (select id from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B WHERE parent_id={0}) ) x JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B y ON x.pg1=y.id JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B z ON x.pg2=z.id ORDER BY case when y.level<z.level then y.level else z.level end
ROOT.GetList1: SELECT x.id,x.name,x.pg1,x.pg2,x.connectionline_type,x.lineid,x.linename,x.volname FROM ( SELECT b.id,b.name,b.pg1,b.pg2,b.connectionline_type,nvl(l.id,s.id) as lineid,nvl(l.name,s.name) as linename,v.name as volname FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONNECTIONLINE_B b JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONNECTIONLINE_R r ON b.id=r.connectionline_id and r.menber_type=0 and r.off_time is null join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_HVDCSYS_B s on r.member_id=s.id LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B l on s.id=l.dcsystem_id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v ON r.voltage_type=v.code WHERE b.pg1={0} or b.pg2={0} or b.pg1 in (select id from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B WHERE parent_id={0}) or b.pg2 in (select id from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B WHERE parent_id={0}) UNION ALL SELECT b.id,b.name,b.pg1,b.pg2,b.connectionline_type as type,r.member_id as lineid,r.line_name as linename,v.name as vol FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONNECTIONLINE_B b JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONNECTIONLINE_R r ON b.id=r.connectionline_id and r.menber_type=1 and r.off_time is null left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v ON r.voltage_type=v.code WHERE b.pg1={0} or b.pg2={0} or b.pg1 in (select id from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B WHERE parent_id={0}) or b.pg2 in (select id from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B WHERE parent_id={0}) ) x JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B y ON x.pg1=y.id JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B z ON x.pg2=z.id ORDER BY case when y.level<z.level then y.level else z.level end
ROOT.GetList_DUMP: SELECT x.id,x.name,x.pg1,x.pg2,x.connectionline_type,x.lineid,x.linename,x.volname FROM ( SELECT b.id,b.name,b.pg1,b.pg2,b.connectionline_type,l.id as lineid,l.name as linename,v.name as volname FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONNECTIONLINE_B b JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONNECTIONLINE_R r ON b.id=r.connectionline_id and r.menber_type=0 and r.off_time is null join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_dcline_b l on r.member_id=l.dcsystem_id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v ON r.voltage_type=v.code WHERE b.pg1={0} or b.pg2={0} or b.pg1 in (select id from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B WHERE parent_id={0}) or b.pg2 in (select id from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B WHERE parent_id={0}) UNION ALL SELECT b.id,b.name,b.pg1,b.pg2,b.connectionline_type as type,r.member_id as lineid,r.line_name as linename,v.name as vol FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONNECTIONLINE_B b JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONNECTIONLINE_R r ON b.id=r.connectionline_id and r.menber_type=1 and r.off_time is null left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v ON r.voltage_type=v.code WHERE b.pg1={0} or b.pg2={0} or b.pg1 in (select id from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B WHERE parent_id={0}) or b.pg2 in (select id from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B WHERE parent_id={0}) ) x JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B y ON x.pg1=y.id JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B z ON x.pg2=z.id ORDER BY case when y.level<z.level then y.level else z.level end
ROOT.GetLines: select member_id from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONNECTIONLINE_r where menber_type=1 union all select l.id from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONNECTIONLINE_r r join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_dcline_b l on r.member_id=l.dcsystem_id and r.menber_type=0
ROOT.GetMembers: SELECT b.id,l.id,l.name,v.name FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONNECTIONLINE_B b JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONNECTIONLINE_R r ON b.id=r.connectionline_id and r.menber_type=0 and r.off_time is null join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_dcline_b l on r.member_id=l.dcsystem_id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v ON r.voltage_type=v.code WHERE b.pg1={0} or b.pg2={0} or b.pg1 in (select id from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B WHERE parent_id={0}) or b.pg2 in (select id from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B WHERE parent_id={0}) UNION ALL SELECT b.id,r.member_id as lineid,r.line_name as linename,v.name as vol FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONNECTIONLINE_B b JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONNECTIONLINE_R r ON b.id=r.connectionline_id and r.menber_type=1 and r.off_time is null left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v ON r.voltage_type=v.code WHERE b.pg1={0} or b.pg2={0} or b.pg1 in (select id from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B WHERE parent_id={0}) or b.pg2 in (select id from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B WHERE parent_id={0})
ROOT.GetAllList: SELECT x.id,x.name,x.pg1,x.pg2,x.connectionline_type,x.lineid,x.linename,x.volname,x.vol,case when y.level<z.level then y.level else z.level end as glevel FROM ( SELECT b.id,b.name,b.pg1,b.pg2,b.connectionline_type,s.id as lineid,s.name as linename,v.name as volname,v.code as vol FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONNECTIONLINE_B b JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONNECTIONLINE_R r ON b.id=r.connectionline_id and r.menber_type=0 and (r.off_time is null or r.off_time>sysdate) join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_HVDCSYS_B s on r.member_id=s.id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v ON s.voltage_type=v.code UNION ALL SELECT b.id,b.name,b.pg1,b.pg2,b.connectionline_type as type,r.member_id as lineid,r.line_name as linename,v.name as volname,v.code as vol FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONNECTIONLINE_B b JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONNECTIONLINE_R r ON b.id=r.connectionline_id and r.menber_type=1 and (r.off_time is null or r.off_time>sysdate) left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v ON r.voltage_type=v.code ) x JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B y ON x.pg1=y.id JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B z ON x.pg2=z.id ORDER BY case when y.level<z.level then y.level else z.level end
